Hex Client¶

When you start hex_client, you’ll see a menu of actions. If this is your first time here, you will want to choose SIGNUP, which will allow you to create your wizard name. Once you have a wizard name, you can start casting spells. Each spell you cast gives you more points. You can also get points if other people support your spells at http://hex.local. As you gain more points, you will learn to cast new spells and your spells will last longer.

The hex runs a low-power web-server which hex_client connects with. You may occasionally have a connection error; usually you can just try again and it will work.

Once you are familiar with all the spells you can cast through hex_client, you may want to start casting your own spells. Please see Writing More Spells.
